name: LegionellosisTestsForLegionellaSpeciesAntigen
title: Legionellosis (Tests for Legionella species Antigen)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Legionella species antigen),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Legionella Antigen),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
